Package moulton.scalable.draggables

Interface ScrollableComponent

All Known Implementing Classes:
ListPanel, StaticTextBox, TextBox, TextHistory, VirtualPanel
public interface ScrollableComponent
Components that have attached ScrollBars should implement this interface. It is used to give support for mouse wheel scrolling or track pad scrolling. If the component is selected, then that action will cause its connected scroll bar to react.
Author:
Matthew Moulton

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    int[][] getActiveScrollCoordinates()  
    ScrollBar getHeightScrollBar()  
    ScrollBar getWidthScrollBar()  

  • Method Details

    • getWidthScrollBar

      ScrollBar getWidthScrollBar()
      Returns:
      the scroll bar associated with this component's horizontal shifting

    • getHeightScrollBar

      ScrollBar getHeightScrollBar()
      Returns:
      the scroll bar associated with this component's vertical shifting

    • getActiveScrollCoordinates

      int[][] getActiveScrollCoordinates()
      Returns:
      where a mouse scrolling action should affect this component. Normally just its rendering or clicking boundaries. int[0] should hold x points and int[1] should hold y points. The number of x and y points should be equal.
